resume.description: Senior Front End Developer with over 9 years of experience in designing, developing, and optimizing web applications using modern technologies. Expertise in React JS, Redux, Javascript, Node.js along with Next.js, TypeScript. Gitlab CI/CD pipelines, and scalable architecture. Strong background in problem-solving, software design, and agile methodologies.
